structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Subsequent Distribution To City Or Town; Insurance
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 165, Sec. 84 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] A city or town which has once been furnished with such books and documents shall not again be supplied with the same at the expense of the commonwealth. Towns may effect insurance on the books and documents for their own benefit.
